author: mreutegg
msg: Disabled the test for now and improved exception chaining for failed reset

author: dennisl
msg: [MCHANGES-282] New parameter releaseDateLocale in changes-check goal

The patch was modified. Most notably, there is no default value for the new parameter. The method that checks the date uses the system default locale instead of a hard coded (parameter) default value. This better mimics the old behavior.

author: jamestaylor
msg: Update Roadmap to indicate port to 0.98 is complete

author: svn-role
msg: Do not leave dead transaction if commit was blocked by start-commit hook.
Leaving dead transaction is not good thing. Regression from 1.7.
